nodes.text: The Chrenthoan Abyss was an area which was controlled by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. In 5 ABY, after much of the Empire's territory had been lost to the New Republic, an Imperial presence remained in the Chrenthoan Abyss. The area was marked as one of the largest territories occupied by Imperial warlords and opportunists, including the Faultheen sector and the Anoat sector, on a holographic map displayed during a New Republic High Command meeting. In that meeting, Admiral Gial Ackbar claimed that territories like the Chrenthoan Abyss were isolated, with only a few posing a serious threat to the New Republic.
The Chrenthoan Abyss appeared in a hologram in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
